reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE best natural deodorant
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is incredible. I have purchased every scent they sell and I honestly can’t pick a favorite. They all smell so good. I have very sensitive skin and none of these break me out. But most importantly - they work ridiculously well. I put it on in the morning and at bedtime I have zero odor even after a hot day outside at the beach or hiking. I can’t comment on if it helps with sweating or not as I’m not a big underarm sweater so I can’t say if it makes a difference in that department, but it does completely eliminate any body smell. I have not had any b.o. at all since I began using this. I ask my husband and my friends and they confirm. I’ve never had a natural deodorant work very well so this stuff blew my mind. Plus there’s the added bonus of people asking me what I’m wearing that smells so good and I get to tell them that it’s my armpits. :-) Try it. Yes, it’s expensive but it’s worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Instagram Ad really got me on this one. I had to look it up and try it out. And I'm not disappointed! It goes on much smoother than I had expected for a natural deodorant. Also, the scent is more subtle that I thought it would be, but that's not a bad thing. My husband had to get pretty close in order to smell it after i applied it. Overall I love this product, and it seems to work well for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product works great as far as helping with body odor. Love the packaging. The fragrance isn’t as great as I was expecting. May be my body chemistry but it makes me smell like a pine tree

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I finally caved after seeing this all over my TikTok FYP. It smells SO good. I got the Santal & Vetiver scent. Salt & Stone's packaging is really beautiful too...I love the neutral/clay colors. I have worn this for a couple of days already and have no complaints... the smell is lovely but not overwhelming - I get subtle whiffs of it when I'm moving about my day. I can't say much about the antiperspirant properties just yet as I haven't put it through the test of a workout, but I will update my review once I do. My only tiny complaint would be that it goes on very wet, so be careful when applying so that it doesn't get all over the place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best natural deodorant I’ve tried
reviews.reviewText: I’m always highly skeptical of natural deodorants and have not had good experiences with other brands in the past. I’ve used this product 2 days in a row and so far I’m impressed. After a 12 hour workday I made my husband do a smell test and he goes “weird it smells really good still”. Absolutely no body odor came through this heavenly scent. I am typically sensitive to baking soda so I half expected to get a rash from this product but so far I have not! Overall the product goes on relatively smoothly, likely because of the coconut oil and shea butter ingredients. If you are looking to try a new natural deodorant I would definitely give this a shot. I also purchased the gel version and will be reviewing that in the coming days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells good and that’s about it
reviews.reviewText: I have wanted to try this deodorant for a long time and now that I have I’m not quite sure what all the hype is about. It does indeed smell good and I knew it was not an antiperspirant but it does not do its job of keeping away BO. A few hours after I apply it that familiar smell starts coming back. I am not interested in a product I need to apply multiple times a day. I will not be repurchasing this product which is a shame because I wanted it to work so badly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Irritating, weak, mediocre scent
reviews.reviewText: I bought both santal & vetiver, and neroli & basil. The santal scent was god awful on both me and my boyfriend, but the neroli & basil was actually delicious. Unfortunately the deodorant isn't very powerful--it barely got either of us through a day of work and it would never last through an actual workout or hot summer afternoon. And it made my pits break out in what looked and felt like razor burn, which I never ever get on my pits otherwise, and which went away as soon as I stopped using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars smells fine, leaves residue
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to love this product after all the social media hype. It smells good, but I wish it was stronger. It does leave a residue on any clothing it touches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Smells great, lasts long, great product.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for how it looked and didn’t expect much but thought “what the hell”.Have to say was very pleasantly surprised. Lasts a long time, even if you sweat a lot, will block the smell all day. The smell itself is very pleasant and exactly like Santal. Does not cause any skin or irritation issues.1 thing to keep in mind is that it will leave marks on dark clothes. Otherwise, great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Really nice scent works well for me although careful on the white marks on the t-shirt when putting it on let it dry first
Doesn’t work for me, not lasting.
